titles.title: To amend title VII of the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize certain programs relating to the health professions workforce, and for other purposes.
Educating Medical Professionals and Optimizing Workforce Efficiency and Readiness Act of 2018
Educating Medical Professionals and Optimizing Workforce Efficiency and Readiness Act of 2018
EMPOWER Act of 2018
Educating Medical Professionals and Optimizing Workforce Efficiency and Readiness Act of 2017
Educating Medical Professionals and Optimizing Workforce Efficiency and Readiness Act of 2017
EMPOWER Act of 2017
EMPOWER Act of 2017
EMPOWER Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Voice Vote .
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Mr. Burgess moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 3728.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
